item.title: Covid-Progression-over-Time
item.description:
Progression of the Virus

We see here the total confirmed cases in the republic, reaching 212647 on 2021-02-18. The blue bars represent the percentage increase on total while the red line tracks total cases.

item.title: Covid-related Hospitalisations
item.description:
Trend in Hospital Admissions

We see here the trend in hospitalisations on 2021-02-18. The blue bars represent the percentage increase on total while the red line tracks total hospitalisations.

item.title: Covid-related ICU Admissions
item.description:
Covid-Related ICU Admissions

We see here the total Intensive Care Unit admissions up to 2021-02-18. Total admissions currently stand at 212647 . The blue bars represent the percentage increase on total while the red line tracks total admission. (note: percentages below 0% relate to days where validation of data led to a decrease in the reported overall number of cases admitted to ICU).

item.title: Evolution-of-the-Mode-of-Transmission
item.description:
Evolution of the Mode of Transmission

As travel restricions came into place the primary mode of infection has moved away from travel to infected regions and it became far more common to catch the virus through close contact with an infected person, such as a family-member; or through Community Transmission. Updated as of 2021-02-18

Back to top

item.title: Hospitalisation by Age-Group
item.description:
Who has been hospitalised?

The red bars show the number of people hospitalised while the shade of red depicts hospitalisation status. Updated as of 2021-02-25.

```

item.title: Infection Rate By County
item.description:
Counties most affected

The representation below uses the shade of the county to show the relative number of cases present with regards to the population. The darker the shade, the greater the prevalence. Updated as of 2021-02-25.
